lead_paragraph: Scott Spiezio hit another key triple and the Cardinals dazzled on defense, dominating the Mets for a 5-0 victory Saturday night and a 2-1 lead in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Scott Spiezio hit another key triple and the Cardinals dazzled on defense, dominating the Mets for a 5-0 victory Saturday night and a 2-1 lead in the best-of-seven series.
